title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
writers:
Leigh Brackett, 
Lawrence Kasdan,
George Lucas
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: The Matrix
actors:
Keanu Reaves,
Laurence Fishburne,
Carrie-Anne Moss
shortDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
actors:
Michael J. Fox,
Christopher Lloyd,
Lea Thompson
shortDescription: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Alien
actors:
Sigourney Weaver,
Tom Skerritt,
John Hurt
shortDescription: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Raiders of th Lost Ark
writers:
Lawrence Kasdan, 
George Lucas, 
Philip Kaufman
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Karen Allen,
Paul Freeman
shortDescription: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Blade Runner
writers:
Hampton Fancher, 
David Webb Peoples, 
Philip K. Dick
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Rutger Hauer, 
Sean Young
shortDescription: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Terminator
writers:
James Cameron,
Gale Anne Hurd,
William Wisher
actors:
Arnold Schwarzenegger, 
Linda Hamilton, 
Michael Biegn
shortDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: The Princess Bride
actors:
Cary Elwes,
Mandy Patinkin,
Robin Wright
shortDescription: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
writers:
Gene Roddenberry,
Jack B. Sowards,
Harve Bennett
actors:
William Shatner,
Leonard Nimoy,
DeForest Kelley
shortDescription: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: Game of Thones
actors: Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington, Peter Dinklage, Lena Headey, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Maisie Williams, Sophie Turner, Isaac Hempstead Wright, Alfie Allen, John Bradley, Gwendoline Christie, Aidan Gillen, Rory McCann, Iain Glen, Liam Cunningham, Carice van Houten, Nathalie Emmanuel, Conleth Hill, Jerome Flynn, Charles Dance
shortDescription: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for a millennia.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, James Whitmore, Brian Delate
shortDescription: The Shawshank Redemption is a powerful drama that tells the story of Andy Dufresne, a banker who is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary for the murder of his wife and her lover. During his time in prison, Andy forms a deep friendship with fellow inmate Red and works to maintain hope and dignity in the face of adversity.

title: Predestination
studio: Screen Australia, Blacklab Entertainment, and Wolfhound Pictures
actors: Ethan Hawke, Sarah Snook, Noah Taylor, Christopher Kirby, Madeleine West, Jim Knobeloch, Freya Stafford
shortDescription: "Predestination" is a mind-bending time travel thriller. The film follows a Temporal Agent, played by Ethan Hawke, on his final mission to apprehend an elusive terrorist known as the "Fizzle Bomber." During his pursuit, he recruits a mysterious recruit, played by Sarah Snook, who has her own complex connection to the case.

title: Black Panther
writers: Ryan Coogler, Joe Robert Cole, Stan Lee, Jack Kirby
actors: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyongo, Danai Gurira, Martin Freeman, Daniel Kaluuya, Letitia Wright, Winston Duke, Angela Bassett, Forest Whitaker, Andy Serkis
shortDescription: As the Black Panther, TChalla must navigate the challenges of ruling his people and protecting his nation vibranium-rich resources while facing external threats. The film explores themes of identity, responsibility, and the consequences of isolationism.

title: Inception
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy, Ken Watanabe, Cillian Murphy, Marion Cotillard, Michael Caine, Tom Berenger, Dileep Rao
shortDescription: Dom Cobb, a skilled thief who specializes in entering people's dreams to steal their deepest secrets. He is offered a chance at redemption by performing an inception â€“ planting an idea into someone's mind

title: Interstellar
actors: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Michael Caine, Casey Affleck, Mackenzie Foy
shortDescription: A science fiction film that follows a group of astronauts led by Cooper (Matthew McConaughey) as they embark on a space mission through a wormhole near Saturn to find a new habitable planet for humanity, which is facing extinction on Earth due to environmental issues.

title: The Dark Knight
writers: Jonathan Nolan, Christopher Nolan, David S. Goyer, Bob Kane
actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Gary Oldman, Morgan Freeman
shortDescription: It follows Batman (Christian Bale) as he faces the chaotic and criminal mastermind known as the Joker (Heath Ledger) in Gotham City. The film also explores the transformation of District Attorney Harvey Dent (Aaron Eckhart) into the vengeful Two-Face.

title: 21 Jump Street
writers: Michael Bacall, Jonah Hill, Michael Bacall, Patrick Hasburgh, Stephen J. Cannell
actors: Jonah Hill, Channing Tatum, Brie Larson, Dave Franco, Ice Cube
shortDescription: A comedic action film that follows two young police officers, Morton Schmidt (Jonah Hill) and Greg Jenko (Channing Tatum), who are sent undercover to a local high school to investigate and stop the spread of a new synthetic drug.

title: Deadpool
studio: 20th Century Fox, Marvel Entertainment, Kinberg Genre, The Donners' Company, TSG Entertainment
writers: Rhett Reese, Paul Wernick, Rob Liefeld, Fabian Nicieza
actors: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, Ed Skrein, T.J. Miller, Gina Carano
shortDescription: A superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name. It follows Wade Wilson (Ryan Reynolds), a former special forces operative who becomes the antihero Deadpool after undergoing a rogue experiment to cure his cancer. The film is known for its irreverent humor, meta-commentary, and breaking the fourth wall.

title: Joker
studio: Warner Bros. Pictures, DC Films, Village Roadshow Pictures, Bron Creative, Joint Effort
actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
shortDescription: A psychological thriller and character study that explores the origin story of Arthur Fleck, a failed stand-up comedian who descends into madness and becomes the iconic DC Comics villain, the Joker. The film delves into themes of mental illness, societal issues, and the consequences of neglect.

title: Pulp Fiction
studio: Miramax Films, A Band Apart, Jersey Films
actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis
shortDescription: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
shortDescription: A man with a low IQ accomplishes great things and influences those around him during a tumultuous period in American history.

title: Schindler's List
actors: Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley, Ralph Fiennes
shortDescription: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
actors: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney
shortDescription: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Casablanca
writers: Julius J. Epstein, Philip G. Epstein, Howard Koch
actors: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid
shortDescription: In World War II Casablanca, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

title: The Wizard of Oz
writers: L. Frank Baum, Noel Langley, Florence Ryerson
actors: Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger
shortDescription: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
writers: T.E. Lawrence, Robert Bolt, Michael Wilson
actors: Peter O Toole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn
shortDescription: The story of T.E. Lawrence, a British officer who successfully united and led Arab tribes during World War I.

title: Psycho
actors: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles
shortDescription: A secretary embezzles money and checks into a remote motel run by a disturbed innkeeper.

title: The Lion King
writers: Irene Mecchi, Jonathan Roberts, Linda Woolverton
actors: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
shortDescription: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Avatar
studio: 20th Century Fox, Lightstorm Entertainment, Dune Entertainment, Ingenious Media
actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver
shortDescription: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: The Shape of Water
studio: Fox Searchlight Pictures, TSG Entertainment, Double Dare You
actors: Sally Hawkins, Octavia Spencer, Michael Shannon
shortDescription: At a top-secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.
